title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1900.1 - Fingerprinting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1900.1 - Fingerprinting

State Regulations

Commencing on January 1, 1990, applications in adoption proceedings in this Court shall be accompanied by the
fingerprints of the adoptive parent or parents. The cost of said fingerprinting
and processing shall be borne by the adoptive parent or parents. The Court will
furnish the necessary cards for such fingerprinting. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
1900.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
